entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind light except north 50 km/h over southern sections. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and early afternoon. A few rain showers beginning in the afternoon. Wind light except north 30 km/h over southern sections in the morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 March 2023
